CmdLine: yum update -y &&     yum install -y         epel-release         gcc         git         initscripts         java-1.8.0-openjdk-headless         openssh-server         python-devel         shadow-utils         sudo         &&     yum install -y         python-pip         python34         python34-devel         &&     yum clean all &&     /usr/sbin/sshd-keygen &&     sed -i 's/.*session.*required.*pam_loginuid.so.*/session optional pam_loginuid.so/g' /etc/pam.d/sshd &&     useradd jenkins &&     echo "jenkins:jenkins" | chpasswd &&     printf 'Defaults:jenkins !requiretty\njenkins ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL\n' > /etc/sudoers.d/jenkins &&     chmod go-rwx /etc/sudoers.d/jenkins
Commands.Name: run
